name: Around the Corner (SassyHat)
description:
This is a demonstration of world design. Not a lot of gameplay besides walking around a spooky environment, so take the time to explore and enjoy! 

You have come to this island in search of the favor of the mansion’s owner. You must make it to and through the mansion to find the owner and earn their favor so you can be given unspeakable power.  (There's not a definitive end to the game, so the goal is not there. This paragraph just describes the story).
